Player History
Had first career hit on 5/29/1965, off Turk Farrell (PIT)...
Injured on 4/18/1970 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Atlanta on 4/8/1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1975...
Injured on 5/13/1976 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/2/1976, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1976, off Fred Scherman (CAL)...
Traded from Cleveland to Los Angeles on 3/2/1979 (Going to LA: C K. Moreland. Going to CLE: P H. Dues, 2B M. DeJohn, C J. Ransom)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against St. Louis on 5/15/1979...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1980, hitting .392 with 3 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/8/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1982, hitting .600 with 0 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/28/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1983, hitting .692 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/8/1984 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Cincinnati on 2/10/1985 (Going to LA: P J. Wetteland, P T. Crews, C T. Munson, P S. Rogers. Going to CIN: 3B J. Mumphrey, DH K. Moreland, LF B. Downing)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 8/2/1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
